mapper.select: SELECT GRP_ID, GRP_NM, GRP_DESC, RUN_MODE FROM GRP_MSTR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY GRP_NM

SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_NM, USER_MSTR.ACCOUNT_CREATE_DT, USER_MSTR.COMP_CD, USER_MSTR.E_MAIL1, USER_MSTR.E_MAIL2, USER_MSTR.TEL_NO, USER_MSTR.HP_NO, USER_MSTR.RUN_MODE AS USER_RUN_MODE, USER_MSTR.USER_DESC, ADD_MONTHS(USER_MSTR.PW_CHANGE_DT, 3) AS PW_CHANGE_DT, GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.RUN_MODE AS GRP_RUN_MODE, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC FROM USER_MSTR LEFT OUTER JOIN GRP_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_MSTR.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, USER_ID
SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_NM, USER_AUTH_DATA_MSTR.DATA_XML FROM USER_MSTR INNER JOIN USER_AUTH_DATA_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_AUTH_DATA_MSTR.USER_NO
SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, GRP_AUTH_DATA_MSTR.DATA_XML FROM GRP_MSTR INNER JOIN GRP_AUTH_DATA_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_DATA_MSTR.GRP_ID

SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_PARENT_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL, AUTH_VIEW, AUTH_PUBLISH, AUTH_DATASOURCE, AUTH_DATAITEM, AUTH_EXPORT FROM GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR INNER JOIN PUB_FLD_MSTR ON GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.FLD_ID = PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID INNER JOIN GRP_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.GRP_ID ORDER BY GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL

SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_PARENT_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL, USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.AUTH_VIEW, USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.AUTH_PUBLISH, USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.AUTH_DATASOURCE, USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.AUTH_DATAITEM, USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.AUTH_EXPORT FROM USER_MSTR INNER JOIN USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.USER_NO INNER JOIN PUB_FLD_MSTR ON USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR.FLD_ID = PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID ORDER BY USER_MSTR.USER_NO, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_LVL, PUB_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ORDINAL

SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, DS_MSTR.DS_ID, DS_MSTR.DS_NM, DS_MSTR.DBMS_TYPE, DS_MSTR.OWNER_NM, DS_MSTR.IP, DS_MSTR.DB_NM FROM GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR INNER JOIN DS_MSTR ON GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR.DS_ID = DS_MSTR.DS_ID INNER JOIN GRP_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR.GRP_ID ORDER BY GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, DS_MSTR.DS_ID
SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.AUTH_DATA FROM GRP_MSTR INNER JOIN GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.GRP_ID

SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.AUTH_DATA FROM GRP_MSTR INNER JOIN GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.GRP_ID WHERE GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID=#{grpId}
SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_NM, USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.AUTH_DATA FROM USER_MSTR INNER JOIN USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.USER_NO

SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_NM, USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.AUTH_DATA FROM USER_MSTR INNER JOIN USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR.USER_NO WHERE USER_MSTR.USER_NO=#{userNo}

SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_DESC, DS_MSTR.DS_ID, DS_MSTR.DS_NM, DS_MSTR.DBMS_TYPE, DS_MSTR.OWNER_NM, DS_MSTR.IP, DS_MSTR.DB_NM FROM USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR INNER JOIN DS_MSTR ON USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR.DS_ID = DS_MSTR.DS_ID INNER JOIN USER_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR.USER_NO ORDER BY USER_MSTR.USER_NO, DS_MSTR.DS_ID

SELECT USER_MSTR.USER_NO, USER_MSTR.USER_ID, USER_MSTR.USER_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.PARENT_FLD_ID FROM USER_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR INNER JOIN USER_MSTR ON USER_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR.USER_NO = USER_MSTR.USER_NO INNER JOIN GRP_MSTR ON GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID = USER_MSTR.GRP_ID INNER JOIN DATASET_FLD_MSTR ON DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID = USER_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR.FLD_ID ORDER BY USER_MSTR.USER_NO, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID

SELECT GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, GRP_MSTR.GRP_NM, GRP_MSTR.GRP_DESC, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_NM, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.PARENT_FLD_ID FROM GRP_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR INNER JOIN GRP_MSTR ON GRP_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID INNER JOIN DATASET_FLD_MSTR ON DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID = GRP_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR.FLD_ID ORDER BY GRP_MSTR.GRP_ID, DATASET_FLD_MSTR.FLD_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MSTR( USER_NO, GRP_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, PASSWD, E_MAIL1, E_MAIL2, DEL_YN, HP_NO, TEL_NO, USER_REL_CD, USER_DESC, RUN_MODE, PW_CHANGE_DT, COMP_CD, LOCK_CNT, HASH_YN, ACCOUNT_CREATE_DT ) VALUES( USER_MSTR_USER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', NULL, #{telNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, #{userDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runMode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, #{compCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, NULL, SYSDATE )
mapper.update:
UPDATE USER_MSTR SET
GRP_ID = #{grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NM = #{userNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_MAIL1 = #{eMail1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_MAIL2 = #{eMail2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL_NO = #{telNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_DESC = #{userDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_MODE = #{runMode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_CD = #{compCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD = PASSWD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE USER_MSTR SET
GRP_ID = #{list[0].grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWD = PASSWD WHERE USER_NO IN
#{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR( GRP_ID, DS_ID ) VALUES ( #{item.grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dsId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR( USER_NO, DS_ID ) VALUES ( #{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dsId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GRP_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO GRP_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR( GRP_ID, FLD_ID ) VALUES ( #{item.grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fldId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO USER_AUTH_DATASET_MSTR( USER_NO, FLD_ID ) VALUES ( #{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fldId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO GRP_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR( GRP_ID, FLD_ID, AUTH_VIEW, AUTH_PUBLISH, AUTH_DATASOURCE, AUTH_DATAITEM, AUTH_EXPORT ) VALUES ( #{item.grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fldId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.authView, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authPublish, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authDatasource, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authDataItem, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authExport, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO USER_AUTH_REPORT_MSTR( USER_NO, FLD_ID, AUTH_VIEW, AUTH_PUBLISH, AUTH_DATASOURCE, AUTH_DATAITEM, AUTH_EXPORT ) VALUES ( #{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fldId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.authView, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authPublish, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authDatasource, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authDataItem, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.authExport, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_AUTH_DATA_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO USER_AUTH_DATA_MSTR( USER_NO, DATA_XML ) VALUES ( #{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dataXml, jdbcType=NCLOB} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GRP_AUTH_DATA_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO GRP_AUTH_DATA_MSTR( GRP_ID, DATA_XML ) VALUES ( #{item.grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dataXml, jdbcType=NCLOB} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_MSTR SET PASSWD = #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PW_CHANGE_DT= TO_DATE(#{pwChangeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE USER_MSTR SET DEL_YN = 'Y', ACCOUNT_DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO GRP_MSTR( GRP_ID, GRP_NM, GRP_DESC, GRP_REL_CD, DEL_YN, RUN_MODE ) VALUES( GRP_MSTR_GRP_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{grpNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grpDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, 'N', #{grpRunMode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT GRP_MSTR_GRP_ID_SEQ.CURRVAL AS grpId FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE GRP_MSTR SET
GRP_NM = #{grpNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRP_DESC = #{grpDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_MODE = #{grpRunMode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_YN = DEL_YN WHERE GRP_ID = #{grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
DELETE FROM USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO GRP_AUTH_PROG_MSTR( GRP_ID, AUTH_DATA ) VALUES ( #{item.grpId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.authData, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL
INTO USER_AUTH_PROG_MSTR( USER_NO, AUTH_DATA ) VALUES ( #{item.userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.authData, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM DUAL
